description: Creates a job with the long-term usage option for a device. The long-term usage is a 1-year or 3-year long-term pricing type for the device. You are billed upfront, and Amazon Web Services provides discounts for long-term pricing.

parameters.name: LongTermPricingType
parameters.description: The type of long-term pricing option you want for the device, either 1-year or 3-year long-term pricing.

parameters.name: SnowballType
parameters.description: The type of Snow Family devices to use for the long-term pricing job.

nested_items.name: LongTermPricingId
nested_items.description: The ID of the long-term pricing type for the device.
